name: VR Death Race 3D: for Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Death Race 3D: for Google Cardboard
description:
• VR Death Run 3D is an extremely addictive hardcore game!
• Quick reflexes and steady hands are necessary to succeed!
• A new, fast, original gameplay!
• If you like hard challenges this is the game for you!
• Your goal is to survive as long as you can, are you up to the task?!
• The longer you survive, the harder it gets!
• Beat your own score, collect all the achievements and reach the top.

Enjoy in now, it's free.
